post.body: ustream is easy enough once you set up your account/channel. Make sure UR not wireless- sounds like common sense, I know...

I like Google Analytics- easy to read, good data- does exactly what I need it to do.
Great, we'll see you all here in July!
@kjarrett my update went fairly smooth-used auto update plugin- after I reactivated all my plugins everything was ready to go.

Keeping up with Santa on Mobile: d'load Google Maps and search for "norad santa." He hasn't left NP yet, but the kids are on the look out!
This week's teacher links digest: http://is.gd/bOtQ - thanks to all you for sharing great ideas. I know my teachers appreciate it.
One week left till "Winter" Break... ;-)
Found my replacement for ReadTheWords... http://spokentext.net Saves files for one day, but the price is right- FREE!
upgraded blog to WordPress 2.7. Like the new interface but it disabled all my plugins and widgets. Anyone else upgraded?
surviving the in-laws...barely.
selling soul... trading truck in on minivan... there goes all my cool points!
Merry Christmas, everyone!
